name: Quadrun
summary: Quadrun is a video game for the Atari 2600 developed by Steve Woita and published in 1983 by Atari, Inc.. One of the four Atari Club games available exclusively via mail order, this title may have been available later in stores in very limited quantities. Only approximately 10,000 cartridges were initially made. Quadrun is the first Atari 2600 game to feature voice synthesis ("Quadrun! Quadrun! Quadrun!"); the only other is Open Sesame, made by Bit Corp.
info:
• 平台: Atari 2600
  • 游戏类型: STG
  • 游玩人数: 1人
  • 发行日期: 1983年11月
  • 游戏设计师: Steve Woita
